definition: to show oneself/to appear/(of a deity) to appear in the flesh
body/life/oneself/personally/one's morality and conduct/the main part of a structure or body/pregnant/classifier for sets of clothes: suit, twinset/Kangxi radical 158
to talk from one's personal experience/to use oneself as an example

sentences.english: This may seem like a rampant game actually only designed by xishi appeared.
sentences.chinese: 這看似猖獗的遊戲實則只爲西施自行現身而設計。

sentences.english: Xu was arrested in the second half hour, Liu coming out of their own.
sentences.chinese: 就在許某被抓獲後半小時，劉某自己現身了。

sentences.english: Doran face suddenly appeared the ginger jing jun, mental instant collapse.
sentences.chinese: 多蘭面對突然現身的姜京俊，精神瞬間崩潰。

sentences.english: Guri surfaced again about a month after the Battle of Endor.
sentences.chinese: 恩多戰役一個月後，古麗再次現身。

sentences.english: The prince's presence stirs hope among the captive Mon Calamari.
sentences.chinese: 王子的現身在蒙卡拉馬裏俘虜中激起了希望。

sentences.english: Nor is he seen wearing something new every time he is in public.
sentences.chinese: 他也並非每次現身公衆場合時都身着新衣。

sentences.english: Take   Kissinger: Would he show up to speak to you alone?
sentences.chinese: 就拿基辛格來說吧，他會爲跟你單獨交談而現身嗎？

sentences.english: A group of guards emerge from the door and shoot Jack with a Taser dart.
sentences.chinese: 一隊警衛從門內現身，用高壓電擊槍射中了傑克。

sentences.english: Conrad later appeared in an American Express advert of famous Americans nobody recognised.
sentences.chinese: 康拉德後來現身於美國運通公司的廣告中。

sentences.english: You know, it's her coming out, saying this is Miley Cyrus .
sentences.chinese: 你知道，這是她的現身，說這是麥莉賽勒斯。

sentences.english: Soon a genie manifests itself from the bottle.
sentences.chinese: 很快一個妖精從燈裏現身了。

sentences.english: A few minutes later, Chita walks around the corner and ambles into the café.
sentences.chinese: 幾分鐘以後，契塔從街角現身，慢慢走了咖啡館。

sentences.english: So far, the distant person that disguise dresses up is bow-backed show a body eventually.
sentences.chinese: 至此，喬裝打扮的遼人駝背終於現身。

sentences.english: Yahweh was present at every battle.
sentences.chinese: 耶和華在每一場戰役中都現身。

sentences.english: Her fervent prayers touched the heart of Buddha and so he appeared to grant her wish.
sentences.chinese: 她的至誠，感動了佛心，於是現身遂其所願。

sentences.english: Why were the records turning up after all this time?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼記錄到這個時候才現身？

definition: (of a performer) to come onto the stage to perform/(of an athlete) to enter the arena to compete/(fig.) to enter the scene (e.g. a new product)/(of an examinee etc) to leave the venue
to be present/to be on the scene
to go on stage/fig. to appear on the scene/used in advertising to mean new product
the scene (of a crime, accident etc)/(on) the spot/(at) the site
bean vermicelli/mung bean starch noodles/Chinese vermicelli/cellophane noodles/CL:把[ba3]/fan (loanword)/enthusiast for sb or sth
